title: The Cigar Authority and BBQ Ribs
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority and BBQ Ribs
description: The Cigar Authority welcomes the new producer...Chuck and smokes Fleur de la Reine along with E.P. Carillo's "Short Run".  Bill Herlicka from White Birch Brewing out of Hooksett, NH joins them in the second hour to share some of his "Short Run" beer.  Plus the Guys are drinking Coffee from Coffee Roasters Cafe in Windham, NH.
